meanings.definition: Capable of conducting electricity when exposed to light.
meanings.sent1: The photoconductive material lit up when the sun shone on it.
meanings.sent2: The solar panel is made of a photoconductive substance that converts light into electricity.
meanings.sent3: The photoconductive wire was so happy to see the sunlight that it started conducting electricity.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as photoconductive as the light bulb, spreading brightness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The photoconductive paint glowed like a star in the dark room, guiding the way.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the photoconductive to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The photoconductive was used in the development of advanced sensors.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous photoconductive played tricks on the other materials in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The photoconductive stood out in the experiment like a shining gem among rocks.
meanings.sent5: The photoconductive material sparkled under the microscope, revealing its unique characteristics.
